title: (x) "Major League" freeware baseball font - TeamSpirit {Yves}
content:
Any ideas what the font is in the word "Major"   
If so, any ideas of a similar freeware/shareware font?   
   
 ![Majro League Movie](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121133955im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/37325.gif)

 [‹ 1919 Topographical Map](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121133955/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5022 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Cargo Magazine logotype - Alpha Headline {Karl} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121133955/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5042 "Go to next forum topic")
author: holyhabanero

comments.content:
I would say that is almost certainly custom designed. You might try Jukebox's Fenway Park for a similar "baseball" feel. You can get it at veer.com (sorry, it's not free).   
   
If anyone else has other "baseball" face suggestions, I'd love to hear them, as well.   
   
Jeff

[TeamSpirit](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121133955/http:/www.fontfreak.com/authors/nick_curtis.htm), cursived underlined font like a baseball logo.   
Freeware. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121133955im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
You guys are awesome. Thanks so much. I am envious of your knowledge.
